text:
This is a test of the text-to-speech synthesizer, which uses text-to-speech technology to convert text from web pages to audio. 

It works in a variety of languages and websites, including news sites, blogs, chats, publications, books and files with EPUB, PDF, TXT extension, teaching materials and various courses 

Developed by Sr. Victor Batista, this project is based on the Read Aloud extension and aims to be more. Comprehensive than its predecessor, being compatible with GPT chat, Chrome, Fire Fox and Kiwi browsers 

The latter, to be better used on mobile devices 



If you heard this content, it means that. Test was successful!
